resources.string: Q.1 Between what times can the order be placed ?
A.1 You can place the order anytime.We are available 24*7 hours.
Q.2 How fast is your deivery ?

A.2 Our delivery man will reach you within 30 minutes of your pacing the order.Very soon in the comng future, we shall also provide functionality to Live Trace the delivery person bringing your order.
Q.3 How efficient is your food packaging ?
A.3 The food is packed so as to keep it warm and fresh till it reaches you.We use eco friendy plastic and foil for the same.
Q.4 Can I trust on the food provided by your restaurants ?
A.4 All our restaurants have been verified by us first and then only are allowed to serve you.
Q.5 Where to contact in case of any problem ?
A.5 You can email to aswaniakshay@gmail.com or call on +91-8107074517 .
